title: Esta Studios Launches New AI Division
brief: We are expanding our horizons with a dedicated team for Neural Networks.
content: Today marks a significant milestone for Esta Studios. We have officially opened our AI & ANN division, focusing on generative models and predictive analytics. This team will support all internal startups.

title: Tech Conference 2024
brief: Join us at the upcoming Innovate 2024 conference in Berlin.
content: Our CEO will be speaking about the future of low-level optimization in high-level applications. Come visit our booth to see demos of GameConnectAI.

title: Quarterly Report
brief: Our Q4 results show promising growth across all sectors.
content: Despite market volatility, Esta Studios has secured Series A funding for two of our major projects. We are grateful for our partners and investors.
